name: Jumping Pushblock
author: Alucard648
info:
"Kick, bounce, crush - AARGH!" 
Jumping pushblock made on request by SkyFlare
description: Pushblock that jumps certain amount of space when pushed. Bounces off walls, can crush Link, if lands on top of him.Update 14.01.2023 - fixed color dependant triggers.
setup: Requires LinkMovement.zh and SolidFFCs.zh1.Set up solid combo with blank tile for CMB_JUMP_PUSHBLOCK_SOLID constant.2. Effect Width and Height used. If TileHeight is greater than EffectHeight / 16, then the script calls JumpPush Renderer, so FFC sprite rendering is aligned to bottom edge of FFC`s hitbox.D0 - bracelet level requirement.D1 - allowed push directions. Add together - 1-up, 2-down, 4-left, 8-right. 0 for all directions.D2 - add together: 1 - gets stuck after 1 push, 2 - gets stuck when landing on trigger, 4 - unused, 8 - ignore triggers, 16 - require triggers with same CSet as FFC`s Cset, 32 - animation on push (uses next combo in list)D3 - jumping distance per push, in combos.
